document.full_text: a court adjourned tuesday the trial of egypt's former interior minister on charges of killing anti-government protesters, delaying the verdict in a case seen as a test for the country's ruling generals.
document.title: egypt adjourns trial of former interior minister
lines_and_colors: a court adjourned tuesday the trial of egypt's former interior minister on charges of killing anti-government protesters, delaying the verdict in a case seen as a test for the country's ruling generals.
